Events that occurred on 2 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1939 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 35.
1948 - Nils-Lennart Johannesson is born.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Edmund R. Meskys
2007 - The Lord of the Rings: The White Council is put on permanent hiatus delay; the video-game would later be cancelled. The Lord of the Rings: Conquest is released instead.
